website_summaries.verdict: A versatile set containing a powerful drill-driver and a lightweight compact impact driver, 2 batteries, a charger, and a soft carry bag.
pros: Between the two units, you can perform a wide range of drilling and driving work
The soft-grip handle, LED light, and battery charge indicator are all welcome features while the lightweight, high-power design will make these drills your go-to choice in your tool kit
cons: It can take a few attempts to fully tighten the chuck so the bit stays firm

website_summaries.verdict: The double power tool punch for professionals. Offers the best value and capability in the Bosch impact driver lineup.
pros: Contains everything needed to use both the 18V drill and impact driver
Carrying case securely fits both tools with room for accessories
cons: Small, slim batteries won't last as long as larger battery options

customer_reviews.title: You can’t beat Bosch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to replace my Makita drill and driver (which served me very well for several years of hard use). At first it seemed these were very underpowered, but after using on some heavy tasks, I realize it is just quieter than my Makitas were and more powerful. The battery life on these is impressive as well. I’ve been able to do several projects and only have charged them when I first got them. Highly recommend any Bosch product, this drill and driver are no exemption.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nye

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good bad is frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Love the impact driver but the drill does not stay tight on drill bits. Very frustrating. Love the battery life and power
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gray

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Durable Tools
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Bosch drill and my first one is still running great, I just wanted the impact driver. The drill definitely got an update since the first one. The keyless chuck is much more durable compared to the first one. It is great to have all the existing batteries work on this one after almost 7 years. High quality and extremely durable tools
customer_reviews.author: Aliounis

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a year!
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t last a year. I don’t even think it lasted 6 months but we didn’t buy the warranty a so we’re screwed. I hate that We wasted hard earned money on crap tools.
customer_reviews.author: Banjobrock

customer_reviews.title: holding up alright
customer_reviews.text: gets the job done. Heads are a bit wonky after a year of home use. The drill makes a strange sound when tightening a bit sometimes (like the bearing is out of place rubbing) but works. The impact driver is good, but after a battle removing the seats out of a 38' bus it was feeling a bit loose in the free play when spinning it by hand when off. It still works to tighten/remove stuff. The quick release sometimes catches and does a wonky-broken thing for a second sometimes but then will re-seat properly after playing around with it. Great performance for what it is. Fights into tight places well. Charges up fast
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The nice quality and feel were my first impressions as I looked over and inspected the two drill motors when opening the box. Secondly, I felt, for their compact size, they were a little heavier than my previous (different brand) items, but well balanced. Overall, I'm really liking these Bosch tools and just hoping the batteries hold up a long time - replacements (like most brands) are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Spyderman

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware, Bosch can be overrated
customer_reviews.text: I only occasionally use either of the set, but... Battery is so small that you will have to charge it occasionally which depletes its life cycle. Power Drill won't hold bits properly which some of the other reviewers found as well. I don't have warranty on it as I only occasionally use the product.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Very good drill chuck
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Struggled finding a drill with a chick that didn't wobble and ended up finding it with a bosch combo. Finally needed to replace the batteries (tools still going strong), and got this set on sale. Drill is even better than the last. Spot on Chuck and feels more robust. Driver is supposed to be more powerful, but haven't pushed it yet. Totally happy with this product and expect great use for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to accompany my job site radio when I replaced a Makita cordless that did it's time and didn't hold much of a charge anymore. These aren't quite the workhorse that the Makita compact was but they are also half the price I paid for the other. They still seem to be well built and durable. I've used them heavily and don't have any complaints. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Bosch high quality, as always
customer_reviews.text: As always, top quality Bosch guns. too bad they don't sell these tools with cases anymore, the tote bags are not as handy or stackable. Somebody mispriced them, I got the pair for just over 120 bucks! The batteries are good, however I am upgrading them to 4Ah for more power and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Twee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband but I have taken them over. They are now all mine. Fast charge and holds a charge a good while. Love being able to "double" duty with a drill in one hand and driver in the other :)
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with Bosch
customer_reviews.text: impulse buy for 129 usd. I have the models from 2015 and they are still going strong. I’m a carpenter by trade and I have used this brand for years without issue. I just wanted another complete set and couldn’t pass up the price. They are a little different from my older models but the batteries are interchangeable still.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan consumer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drill/driver combo for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bosch makes very good stuff. Are there better, I suppose. For 3 times the price. This combo, when I bought was a ridiculously good price. And they work awesome. I will never go without an impact driver again. And for the price of the driver I got the drill included effectively. Worth every penny to me!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain
customer_reviews.text: I started doing a few home renovation projects and these came in super handy. I got a circular saw from the same company and love the quality. I am not a pro and for home projects these are MORE than enough. Love them and strongly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Vesko

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Initially concerned about torque and battery life... Not an issue! One charge will drill 100 plus holes and drive 3 1/2 #10 screws with power to spare! Even drove several 6" by 1/4" concrete screws with no issues. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Phat Katt

customer_reviews.title: amazing set
customer_reviews.text: this is an amazing combination of quality professional tools. you cannot go wrong with Bosch. the battery seems to never run out of juice and you can always interchange between the two. the bag is very useful to keep everything organized. that's a tool set for life.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Been looking for a good drill a long time finally found one love it ...
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a good drill a long time finally found one love it strong powerful well-made comfortable in here and tons of power long-lasting battery quit charging takes about 20 minutes to charge my battery full just love them great set
customer_reviews.author: Jcchevy1

customer_reviews.title: Be careful buying electrical items
customer_reviews.text: Made a mistake of buying of Amazon.com as we live in Fuerteventura. They very kindly shipped it to our address and never mentioned that it came with a US pin plug and was not compatible with the EU voltage system. Consequently blew the charger when trying to covert using a EU plug. So now left with a brand new never been used drill and impact driver that can only be used with US Battery Charger. Value for money would have been great if we could have used it. Battery life have no idea as never got to use it. Be careful if buying electrical goods from a US website as they will not work outside the US.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The chuck can sometimes be a small annoyance - you ...
customer_reviews.text: The chuck can sometimes be a small annoyance - you think your bit is tight, but it sometimes falls out.
customer_reviews.author: NM86

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: Borrowed these off a friend of mine to do a project.knew these were the ones I wanted so I bought them. I am glad I did and so is my friend. A must need tool
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Great set, recommended to every house.
customer_reviews.text: Great set, a lot of power but good also for more gentle works (of course that depends on your ability to use the it). The batteries charge time is quick and work time is long. only down size I see is the weight that is a bit heavier than my other set. Overall Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Y.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value Combo Kit
customer_reviews.text: Love feel of tools. They feel perfect, well balanced in my hand. Cannot comment on battery life because I just received items today. I expect (3) years life from these batteries.
customer_reviews.author: jack braddell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome starter kit and replacement for screw-drivers..
customer_reviews.text: These are an awesome set, immensely useful and a good kit to have lying around the house.. Using these drills, I will never go back to manual screw-drivers again..
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product and price
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than any department store, I have no issues with this Bosch set. I did buy the L-Boxx 2 since I have multiple Bosch 18v tools so it makes it easier to travel and get banged around. Also surprised from the 2amp batteries and their life in these. The 4amps seem perfect for the other power tools (circular saw, jig saw, etc.) that require more power to run.
customer_reviews.author: King Of Scotland

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great set. It was time to replace our Craftsman drills after 15 years and these stood out in online reviews. Our friends have a similar set and they recommended these as well.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Student

customer_reviews.title: Less power
customer_reviews.text: 12volts was better then this one battery dies so quickly need to keep charging the compact drill has no power stop in the middle when making four inch hole in regular wood not recommended if you doing heavy work which I do
customer_reviews.author: rubab rahman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He is very please with it. It was a very good price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Short

customer_reviews.title: Bosch the top brand tool for professional and home use
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing bad to say about this tool. I have a crew of 5 guys that we use this tool for everything in the home improvement field. I have even bought this system for friends to do small jobs around their home or apartment. THIS IS A MUST HAVE TOOL.
customer_reviews.author: MC1

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, it’s a great pair of tools that make things so much easier. Bottom line is, it’s Bosch, I trust this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Will Xu

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money and reliable. My man loves it, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Julez

customer_reviews.title: Great tools!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - very smooth and powerful - impact "hammering" starts later than with Makita tools (easier to handle) Cons: - slightly heavier than comparable Makita combo kit tools - work light turns off instantly
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: I really like this drill combo set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this drill combo set. I've been using it extensively for a few months and I have no complaints. Not too heavy in the hand, but just right. The batteries are also interchangeable on other Bosch tools, which is clever. Update: 2018 It's still as good as new. Completely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Great drill set
customer_reviews.text: The drill and driver haven't let me down after a year. One friend used them while at my house and he said they made him want to upgrade his drill.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: top class
customer_reviews.text: everything a drill should be. Better than dewalt IME. Excellent in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Bosch 18v cordless drill is an excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and weight. I also liked the chargers (easy to assemble). These cordless drills are handy and come with nice bag. Most of all, they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Good drills

customer_reviews.title: Drill chuck failed

customer_reviews.title: We bought it for our daughter for her birthday since she now has her own home and my husband is so happy with his set

customer_reviews.text: This item was sent as a replacement for the same item. I used it for a short time and found that it performed poorly. The gears slip when the drill tip was changed or while in use. I have used many Bosch products in the past but found this to be of poor quality. I'm returning the item and requesting a refund. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Price, Works Great

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tool set!

Got rid of my Dewault set for these. I think these are more durable and everybody has Dewault or Makita so now nobody will "accidentally" have my batteries.

customer_reviews.title: so it is not useful for drilling in masonry

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend Bosch power tools to anyone

product_meta.title: Bosch Power Tools Drill Set - CLPK232A-181 – 18-Volt Cordless Drill Driver/Impact Combo Kit with 2 Batteries, 18V Charger and Soft Carrying Case
product_meta.description: Style:2 tool combo kitThe Bosch CLPK232A 181 18 Volt cordless Combo kit provides the maximum amount of maneuverability Plus power on a jobsite. This collection has two powerhouses that deliver muscle to weight proportion: the Bosch DDS181A compact tough 1/2 inch drill/driver and the Bosch 25618 1/4 inch Hex impact driver. The drill/driver features Bosch heavy duty chuck, which prevents drill bits from slipping during high torque applications, thanks to high clamping force. It also has an innovative canned motor, which is more compact but provides the same power as conventional 18 Volt motors. The drill produces powerful performance, with 600 Inch lbs. Of torque and two drilling speeds (0 1, 700 RPM for high speed and 0 500 RPM for torque). it is very compact, with a 7. 0 Inch head length and a weight of only 3. 5 lbs. The impact driver is designed for professional driving jobs, supplying 1, 500 Inch lbs. Of torque, 2, 800 RPM and 3, 200 BPM – with a short 5. 7 Inch head length. The included two 18 Volt Lithium Ion slim pack batteries and an 18 Volt charger ensure these tools run as long as the job takes. Includes: (1) DDS181A compact tough 1/2 inch drill/driver, (1) 25618 1/4 inch Hex impact driver, (1) 18 Volt charger, (2) 2. 0 Ah Slim Pack
feature_bullets: POWER: Bosch DDS181A drill and driver provides innovative 18 Volt canned motor that's more compact with the same torque as other 18 Volt power tools
LIGHTWEIGHT: Bosch DDS181A drill/driver features lightweight and compact tough design with a 7. 0 Inch head length and only 3. 5 pounds , meter

Torque and speed: This drill kit contains the Bosch 25618 cordless drill with 2 batteries (2. 0 Ah slim pack batteries); The Bosch 25618 1/4 inch hex Impact driver’s powerful wrench delivers 1, 500 pounds Of professional grade torque and 3, 200 BPM and 2, 800 no load RPM
Compact: Bosch 25618 impact driver is the most compact in its Class, with a 5.7 Inch head length and weighs only 3. 8 pounds
COMBO KIT: Includes (1) DDS181A compact tough 1/2 inch drill/driver, (1) 25618 1/4 inch hex impact driver, (1) 18 Volt drill charger, (2) 2. 0 AH slim pack batteries, (1) carrying bag
